merata hitapu madhya pradhaniyakuta maladiwayin janapathigen dos thamange rata wenuwen nowa ratata erehiwa kriya kirima sandaha obage paminima lachjawata karunak yayi maladiwayin janadhipathi mohamad nashid mahatha merata nidahas madhya wyaparaye hitapu pradhaniya hata dadi lesa chodana karamin kiya sitiyeya. 5 shishyathwa prathipala ada paha shreniye shishyathwa wibhaga prathipala ada (15 wanida) nikuth karana bawa wibhaga komasaris janaral anura edirisinha mahatha "diwayina"ta eeye (14 da) pawasiya.

ashoka adhirajaya wisin ohuge palana samaye idikala sthambhaya eya bawa ohu ge nigamanaya wiya.wisiwani siyawase agabhagayedi lumbiniya pilibanda sampurna gaweshanayak aarambha kala athara ewakata eksath jathinge maha lekam dhuraya daru buruma jathika bauddhayaku wu uunanm mahatha ema katayuththa sandaha pradhanathwaya gena kriya kaleya.
